Description:
At Vialto we create the connections that build global careers and societies, bridging the gap between people and their aspirations. As the world of work continues to evolve, we are bringing together the individuals, ideas, and technology to unlock business and human growth.The tasks, roles and responsibilities pertaining to the job role of an Assistant Manager will include the following:Interacting with senior expatriate assignees and middle management client contacts on day-to-day matters
Reviewing and finalizing the tax computations - withholding tax computation, advance tax etc.
Reviewing individual tax returns
Working on advisory projects involving technical analysis and drafting memo, presentations etc.
Independently handling scrutiny assessments including preparing the submissions, highlighting complex tax issues and representations before tax officers
Co-ordinating with the tax authorities and visiting the tax office of regular follow-ups, rectification, refund follow-up etc.
Analyzing and interpreting Provisions of the Income-tax Act, 1961, Foreign Exchange Management Act, 1999, Social Security Law, tax treaties, Social Security Agreements.
Responsible for the complete execution of the assigned engagements.
Overseeing the work of Associate, Analysts and Senior AnalystsQualifications - Chartered AccountantWorking in this discipline will see an Assistant Manager working on engagements and teams (the sizes of which will vary depending on client/project).To qualify for the same an Assistant Manager will need:To be a Qualified Chartered Accountant with 2-3 year of relevant experience
Thorough knowledge of direct tax and expatriate tax is expected
Knowledge of the current developments and impact of the same on the individual taxation
Other prerequisite skills include:
Thorough knowledge of tax regulations, interpretation of treaties etc.
Demonstrating innovative and critical thinking in managing projects
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Strong analytical and numerical skills
Good interpersonal skills including the ability to coach juniors
Passion for client servicing
Excellent eye for detail
Efficiency in MS office and report writing skills
Ability to understand and articulate technical concepts
Ability to develop project management and supervisory skills, involving effective time management and task prioritization
Ownership and responsibility of clients/tasks delegatedJob Details
